channel.title: Entertainment

item.title: YouTuber Adam the Woo Dies at 51: ‘The World Has Lost a Giant’
item.description: Adam "the Woo" Williams was found dead in his Celebration, Fla., home on Monday, Dec. 22, the Osceola County Sheriff's Office confirms to PEOPLE
